attributes.action: Uk Govt to adopt Covid travel passports in line with EU
attributes.additional_details: Rapid adoption of a system that confirms vaccination / immunity to Covid 19 will facilitate safer freedoms of movement and unlock restrictions to business and trade.
attributes.background: Uk government to implement a health passport consistent with the EU confirming vaccination / immunity to covid 19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574479

We could accept a petition calling on the UK Government to seek to participate in any Covid-19 vaccine passport scheme developed by the EU, if that's what you want to happen.
